title: Leadrshp-Changing Enviro
description: Uses increasingly intense situational leadership challenges to build cadet awareness and skills in leading tactical operations up to platoon level. Cadets review aspects of combat, stability, and support operations. They also conduct military briefings and develop proficiency in garrison operation orders. The focus is on exploring, evaluating, and developing skills in decision-making, persuading, and motivating team members in the contemporary operating environment (COE). Cadets are evaluated on what they know, and do as leaders as they prepare to attend the ROTC summer Leadership Develpment Assessment Course (LDAC).
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MSL 3001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
